page.title: 19HOME LIFE ST.NINIANS
page.content: Every Friday the whole of the Scown family get up early. They get dressed and go down for breakfast. After breakfast Mr. and Mrs. Scown go to work while the children go to school. Mr. Scown is the Manager of a computer company and his wife is his secretary. After school both children go to table tennis and don't come home till six o'clock.By the time they get home the evening meal is ready. After tea they do their homework and go swimming. While they are swimming their Mum and Dad go to squash. They all get home around 8 o'clock when they usually have their supper and a family discussion. The children go to bed at 9.30p.m. and the parents go between 11.30p.m. and midnight. Every Saterday morning the family play tennis, have their lunch in the Pavilion and go out for the day. (W.Brown, L.Scobie.)
